songs.title: Predestination
songs.lyrics:
Feel the "untouched virgin" world…
Round n' round its axis it twirls…
As we count the final hours:
Never ending unfair powers!

Immoral, torturous fate…
Dread n' horror that millions hate…
Kicking all the little people;
Just like forever more!

The flame of the past has faded forever!
Time's rewritten all the future!
Stand in the shadows looking up higher…
Fate revenges with fire!

The sky's so bright n' so vast!
What's past…is long past!

Be happy and don't you ever fret;
All who give up, deserve what they get!
Hear me speak the prophet's new words now…!
